name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free VPN Chrome extension - VPN Proxy Streamix

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free VPN proxy extension for easy and private access to any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Try a free VPN for Chrome – unblock sites, protect your privacy, and surf the Internet at high speed. No registration and manual settings required. Add our extension to your browser and get instant access to your favorite sites. 

Use our fast VPN to connect to any location around the world without connection drops or security issues. Install the extension with a one-click connect and enjoy smooth surfing — anywhere, at any time. 

Struggling to access social media sites, streaming services, and online games at school or work? Consider Streamix VPN – a perfect unblocker for all your needs. Connect to remote proxy servers for free! Here are the key benefits you will get with our Chrome VPN.

✦ No account needed
You don’t need to fill out any forms and register an account to use our free VPN for Chrome. Get started without sharing any data – simply set up the extension and enjoy free browsing.
 
✦ Unblock sites and apps
Unblock any websites wherever you are. Access your favorite content from any location – avoid geo-restrictions, Wi-Fi limitations, and IP bans. Say no to Internet censorship and embrace online freedom!

✦ Unlimited traffic
Use a VPN to avoid traffic and data limitations on your network. Watch HD videos, listen to music, play games, and download files without reaching your bandwidth cap.

✦ High speed
Connect to our free VPN servers and switch between locations smoothly. Our extension ensures a high speed of Internet connection, providing a perfect balance of enhanced security and excellent performance.

✦ Online privacy
Make sure that Wi-Fi administrators, Internet service providers, and website owners don’t track your online activities. A VPN will spoof your IP address and hide your real location, making your online presence safe and anonymous.

✦ Many locations available
Change your location and get a new IP address in no time! Browse the web as if you were in another country – unlock the full potential of the Internet with Streamix VPN.

✦ One-click connect
Connect to a free VPN server in a single click. Enjoy your online privacy and anonymity without complicated settings and manual configurations.

Our solution was designed for easy and unrestricted access to the Internet. Protect your data on public Wi-Fi and don‘t let anyone snoop on you online. Unblock sites, protect your connection, and experience unlimited traffic — all without complicated setup and registration. 

Get a user-friendly VPN for Chrome right away! It’s free for everyone.
